original_title: 魔進戦隊キラメイジャー ファイナルライブツアー
overview: A live show that was performed across Japan in April and May of 2021, acting as a final farewell for the cast. It comprises two parts: a scripted show part, and a talk show with the cast. The Zenkaigers also appear.
title: Mashin Sentai Kiramager Final Live Tour 2021
